     Lex Mortisis an open-world horror game set on a  fully explorable
     island. The games atmosphere is directly affected by the  time of
     day.  During  the  daytime  you will  study the  island  and  its
     mysteries. But at night the enemies reveal  themselves,  and  the
     worst  nightmare  becomes  real! June  28, 2017,  you  return  to
     your birthplace, Berdwood island, which is  located  in  Northern
     Europe.
